name: Potion Notions
description:
This potion-based ASCII adventure was created for the 2020 Oktrollberfest game jam.

You play as Bluey, a treasure hunting dragon who's after an ancient artifact held inside a bizarre temple dedicated to the alchemic arts. Press P at the game's title screen to play. Use the arrow keys to move around, and hold SHIFT and press a direction to fire a lightning bolt in that direction. Investigate objects by moving into them.
